name: AmputatorBot
author: bencos18
description: A Redbot cog that converts AMP URLs to canonical URLs using the AmputatorBot API.
install_msg: Thank you for installing AmputatorBot. Use `[p]amputator` to get started.
short: Converts AMP URLs to canonical URLs.
end_user_data_statement: This cog stores user IDs for the purpose of tracking opt-in status.
